definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_current_time"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">24000</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12000</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="itemstack_shrink"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_while"><value name="BOOL"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">NEQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_current_time"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">24000</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12000</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="set_time"><value name="time"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_current_time"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
